snippet: Foreign Minister Mohammad Javad Zarif said Iran wanted to negotiate seriously, and he offered to begin a dialogue on human rights issues with the European Union.
abstract: Iranian Foreign Min Mohammad Javad Zarif and Secretary of State John Kerry briefly meet in Munich, in sign of serious effort to resolve crisis surrounding Iran's nuclear program.

byline.contributor: Isabel Kershner contributed reporting from Jerusalem.

lead_paragraph: Foreign Minister Mohammad Javad Zarif said Iran wanted to negotiate seriously, and he offered to begin a dialogue on human rights issues with the European Union.

headline.main: Kerry and Iran Minister Confer on Nuclear Issue
headline.print_headline: Kerry and Iran Minister Confer on Nuclear Issue
